name: ocara
description: Monorepo containing both the web app and the api

scripts.postinstall: if [ $CLIENT_ENV ]; then npm run postinstall-web; elif [ $SERVER_ENV ]; then npm run postinstall-app; else echo no environment detected, please set CLIENT_ENV or SERVER_ENV; fi
scripts.postinstall-web: cd web && npm install && npm run build

author: Henrique Freitas Souza
